effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Fighting moves by 20%.
Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder's type becomes Fighting.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Fighting-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Fighting.

flavor_text_entries.text:
かくとうの　タイプの　石盤。
持たせると　かくとうタイプの
技の　威力が　強まる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fighting-type moves.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Lastra di pietra che potenzia le mosse
di tipo Lotta.

Si lo lleva el primer Pokémon del equipo, se
reduce la probabilidad de que se acerquen
Pokémon salvajes.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Diese Steintafel verstärkt
Attacken vom Typ Kampf.

Objet à tenir. Une tablette en pierre augmentant
la puissance des capacités de type Combat.

격투타입의 석판.
지니게 하면 격투타입
기술의 위력이 강해진다.

かくとうの　タイプの　せきばん。
もたせると　かくとうタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　つよまる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fighting-type moves.

augmentant la puissance des capacités
